transform_def.name: designed28
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = sin((abs(p_in.x) + abs(p_in.y)) * pi()) t = cos((p_in.x + p_in.y) * (p_in.x - p_in.y) / pi()) u = sin((abs(p_in.x + p_in.y) + abs(p_in.x - p_in.y)) * pi()) v = sin(p_in.x * p_in.y / pi()) z = recip(if r < twoinvpi() then s * u / t / v else recip(s * u / t / v)) / twopi() con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
